name: 8.7 Alpine Sender Dry Rope
description: All-around rope for mountaineering

Triple certified all-around rope for ice climbing, mountaineering and performance mountain climbing: the 8.7 Alpine Sender Dry Rope features a smooth sheath made from premium quality yarns to minimize its weight and diameter. The rope impresses with its easy handling and durability. 8.7 Alpine Sender Dry Rope - the all-around rope for demanding climbing, when every gram counts.

values: Sender construction for ultimate light weight
Lasting effectiveness in repelling water and dirt according to UIAA for maximum safety in the toughest conditions
Achieves < 1.5% in UIAA water absorption tests
Optimized abrasion resistance thanks to Dry finishing
Ready to climb, packed to prevent tangling, no need to uncoil the rope before use
Triple certified single, half and twin rope
Mammut Dry ropes boast lower water absorption and extra abrasion resistance for more safety. Treated ropes last longer, making them great in wet conditions.

name: 10.1 Gym Station Classic Rope
description: Durable rope for the climbing gym

10.1 Gym Station Classic Rope. A durable dynamic rope for the climbing gym. Featuring a special braided core construction designed to minimize slipping of the sheath - in particular, during use as a top rope. Ideal for use in climbing gyms and with a long service life.

values: Special braided core construction that minimizes sheath slippage, particularly when used as a top rope

values: Extra-grippy aramid sheath construction for easy handling, high friction while rappelling, low abrasion and also to aid in braking when arresting a crevasse fall

Hyperstatic rope with less than 2% stretch for greater efficiency in rescue maneuvers and to prevent the bungee effect during rappelling or a crevasse fall
